title: However, the structures under clause 10
clause_text: However, the structures under clause 10.8.2 and 10.8.3 shall also have option of development under Regulation No. 14.8.1 (Urban Renewal Scheme).

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: However, the structures under clause 10.8.2 and 10.8.3 shall also have option of development under Regulation No. 14.8.1 (Urban Renewal Scheme).
